DOC.brief_summary: Use EnSite NavX system map coronary vasculature CRT implant
DOC.brief_title: EnSite NavX-Guided Coronary Sinus Mapping During CRT Implant
DOC.detailed_description: Objective ( ) : To determine feasibility CS mapping NavX Biventricular Implantable Cardioverter Defibrillator ( BiV ICD ) implantation . Inclusion Criteria : - Subject age 18 75 year - Subject willing able sign study specific inform consent - Subject able fulfill study requirement - Meet conventional criterion implant BiV ICD , include ; LVEF ≤35 % , QRS ≥ 120 m NYHA III-IV - Have persistent CHF symptom despite contemporary CHF medical therapy - Stable optimal medical therapy ( stability change past 3 month ) . - Documented history ischemic non-ischemic cardiomyopathy . Exclusion Criteria : - Have standard device exclusion include tricuspid valve prosthesis/ replacement . - Have positive urine serum pregnancy test ( female childbearing potential ) - Be currently participate IDE IND study .
DOC.criteria: Meet criterion CRT implant include EF < 35 % , QRS > 120ms , NYHA class III IV Persistent CHF symptom despite optimization Stable/optimal medical therapy History ischemic nonischemic cardiomyopathy Any standard device exclusion include TVR Positive pregnancy test Currently participate IDE/IND study
